content: ocean of love wrap was first designed as a shawl to wear on my wedding day this pattern is quite versitile as you can use any weight yarn 4ply/sock/#1 weight 8ply/dk/#3 weight 10ply/aran/#4 weight the pattern features the following - beginner friendly stitches treble_crochet/dbtr chain skip st - photos to help you get started - instructions for all row row 1 -10 in detail - full stitch count chart - pattern has been fully tested - pattern in us and uk terms this is a free crochet pattern by buttonnose crochet you are free to sell your finished items but please do not copy share or make videos of this pattern without my permission thank you please feel free to contact me on my facebook page if you have any questions if you have a specific pattern question please pop on over to my ravelry group buttonnose crochet community /groups/buttonnose-crochet-community
